A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Personaly I like the movie. I think it was a bit better than The Force Awakens. There was an action\, emotions and some surprising moments\, just as I expected. Everybody did a good job. But I have to reproach some things\, for example SPOILERS: dry humour or  Snoke's rushed death\, they could've open up his character more. Anyway there were things that I really enjoyed\, for example Yoda's appearance\, it was really great to see this tiny man with his wiseness again\, even if it was for a short time. Space battle\, that Force conection between Kylo and Rey and I can't forget Luke's jedi trick that he used at the end\, it was awesome! Btw. Poor Hux
